snippet: Albert Pujols played infrequently at Yankee Stadium with the Cardinals. Now an Angel, Pujols will play in the Yankees’ home opener.
abstract: New York Yankees are bracing for the power of Los Angeles Angels first baseman Albert Pujols when they host the Angels for their home opener; Pujols, formerly with the St Louis Cardinals, played infrequently at Yankee Stadium, but the Angels will make two trips to Yankee Stadium in 2012.
lead_paragraph: Albert Pujols played infrequently at Yankee Stadium with the Cardinals. Now an Angel, Pujols will play in the Yankees’ home opener.

headline.seo: Albert Pujols Will Visit Yankee Stadium More Often
headline.main: Yankees Are Bracing for the Power of Pujols
